de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.api.elements.concepts

Interface IValueChangeable<V,X extends IValueChangeable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MCheckbox, MSpinner

    public interface IValueChangeable<V,X extends IValueChangeable>
    Default interface to be implemented by elements that can have more than once state, such as checkboxes, spinner, etc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireChangeListener(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer, V oldValue, V newValue)
      Called by the Renderer when this element was interacted with.
      OnChangeListener<V,X> getOnChangeListener() 
      void setOnChangeListener(OnChangeListener<V,X> listener)
      Set the listener object that will be informed when the value of this element changes.

    • Method Detail

      • setOnChangeListener

        void setOnChangeListener(OnChangeListener<V,X> listener)
        Set the listener object that will be informed when the value of this element changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - the new Listener object

      • getOnChangeListener

        OnChangeListener<V,X> getOnChangeListener()
        Returns:
        the listener currently set to this element

      • fireChangeListener

        void fireChangeListener(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer,
                        V oldValue,
                        V newValue)
        Called by the Renderer when this element was interacted with.
        Parameters:
        viewer - the player responsible for the change
        oldValue - the value this element had before it was changed
        newValue - the value this element now has
